dc_description_s: This feature contains health statistics on the City of Grand Rapids. Health statistics were provided through the City Health Dashboard Data. The data is organized by Census Tract. Data is estimated, visit City Health Dashboard for details on data modeling process. .City Health Dashboard. City Health Dashboard Data. New York: City Health Dashboard; 2018. Available for download at www.cityhealthdashboard.com. Attribute DetailsAirpollution: Average daily concentration of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) per cubic meter (average) - range: 2014Bingedrinking: Binge Drinking among adults ages 18 and older (% of total population)ChildreninPov: Children living in households 100% below the federal poverty line (%)Dentalcare: Visits to dentist or dental clinic in the previous year among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)Diabetes: Diabetes among adults over 18 years old (% of total population) - range: 2017MentalDist: Mental health not good for 14 day during the past 30 days among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)PhysicalDist: Physical health not good for 14 days during the past 30 days among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)HighBloodPres: High blood pressure among adults 18 year and older (% of total population)ExHousinCost: Household where more than 30% of household income is spent on housing costs (% of total population)HomeLeadRist: Housing stock with potential elevated lead risks (% of housing stock) - range: 2017IncomeInequal: Households with income at the extremes of the national income distribution (the top 20% or bottom 20%) Index - range: 2017LeadExpIndex: Poverty-adjusted risk of housing based lead exposure (index) - range: 2017LifeExpectanc: Average life expectancy from birthHealthyFood: (% of total population)Obesity: Adult obesity among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)TotPysicalInAct: No leisure-time physical activity in past month among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)PreventSerTot: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of total population)PreventSerMen: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of Males)PreventSerFemale: Adults over 65 years old who are up to date on a core set of clinical preventive services (% of Females)RacialEthnicD: (% of total population)Smoking: Current smoking among adults over 18 years old (% of total population)Unemployment: Current adults under 65 years old who are unemployed (% of total population)Uninsurance: Current lack of health insurance among people aged 0-64 years (% of total population)
